Job Posting:175058 - Position: W26 Mobile Application Developer Co-op - Android 17505 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/04/2025 03:05 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Mobile Application Developer Co-op - Android 17505 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Mobile Application Developer Co-op - Android (Winter 2026) Job ID: 2025-21184 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product Job Summary We are seeking an enthusiastic and motivated Mobile (Android) Application Developer Co-op to join our mobile development team. As a Mobile App Co-op, you will gain hands-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining Android applications while working alongside experienced developers. This is an excellent opportunity to apply your academic knowledge to real-world projects and build your professional portfolio. Key Responsibilities • Assist in the development of Android applications using Kotlin and Java, following established coding standards and best practices • Contribute to the implementation of new features and improvements to existing Android applications under the guidance of senior developers • Work with designers to implement user interface components and ensure smooth user experiences across different Android devices and screen sizes • Write unit tests and assist in debugging applications to ensure quality and reliability • Help maintain and update existing codebases, fix bugs and improve performance • Create and update technical documentation for features and code you work on • Actively participate in code reviews, team meetings, and knowledge-sharing sessions to expand your skills Work closely with other developers, designers, and product team members in an agile environment • In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization. Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Currently enrolled in a Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related program • Basic to intermediate knowledge of Kotlin and/or Java • Familiarity with Android Studio and Android SDK • Understanding of object-oriented programming principles • Basic knowledge of RESTful APIs and JSON • Experience with Git or willingness to learn • Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail • Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team • • Eagerness to learn new technologies and development practices Self-motivated with good time management skills Ability to take constructive feedback and iterate on solutions • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/21184/mobile-application-developer-co-op---android-%28winter-2026%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
